handlerMessages.pinged_title: Oops, you pinged me? Need help?
handlerMessages.pinged_description: **Hello!!, my name is Hatsume and you can see my list of commands with `$$Commands` Thank you.**
handlerMessages.error_command: There was an error trying to execute this command!
handlerMessages.needescentialspermissions: **I need `EMBED_LINKS` AND `USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS` permissions to execute most commands, before using me please give me these permissions.**

permissionAuth.bot_description: **I need the necessary permissions to execute this command. `{permissionString}`**
permissionAuth.user_description: **You do not have the necessary permission to execute this command. `{permissionString}`**
